statements.select: select * from notas where statusDaNota = 41;
statements.update: update notas set statusDaNota = 4 where NFe_ide_nNF = #nNf# and serie = #serie# and NFe_emit_CNPJ = #cnpj#;
statements.select: select * from notas where statusDaNota = 61;
statements.update: update notas set statusDaNota = 6 where NFe_ide_nNF = #nNF# and serie = #serie# and NFe_emit_CNPJ = #cnpj#;
statements.delete: delete from notas where NFe_ide_nNF = #nNF# and serie = #serie# and NFe_emit_CNPJ = #cnpj#;
statements.select: SELECT * FROM notas WHERE impressaoSolicitada > 0 AND (statusDaNota LIKE '2%' OR statusDaNota LIKE '5%');
SELECT * FROM notas WHERE NFe_ide_nNF = #id#;

SELECT NFe_ide_nNF, serie, NFe_emit_CNPJ, statusDaNota, NFe_ide_dEmi, NFe_dest_CNPJ, NFe_dest_CPF, NFe_dest_xNome, NFe_total_ICMSTot_vNF FROM notas WHERE NFe_emit_CNPJ = #nota.NFe_emit_CNPJ# AND (
NFe_ide_nNF= #nota.NFe_ide_nNF#
NFe_dest_CNPJ LIKE '%' #nota.NFe_dest_CNPJ# '%'
NFe_dest_CPF LIKE '%' #nota.NFe_dest_CPF# '%'
NFe_dest_UF LIKE '%' #nota.NFe_dest_UF# '%'
NFe_dest_xNome LIKE '%' #nota.NFe_dest_xNome# '%'
emailDest LIKE '%' #nota.emailDestinatario# '%'
statusDaNota = #nota.statusDaNota#
) LIMIT #registroInicial#, #registrosPorPagina#;
SELECT * FROM notas WHERE statusDaNota LIKE '' #status# '%' AND NFe_emit_CNPJ = #cnpj# ORDER BY NFe_ide_nNF DESC LIMIT #registroInicial#, #registrosPorPagina#;
SELECT * FROM notas
SELECT * FROM notas WHERE statusDaNota = #naoProcessada# OR statusDaNota = #DPECEnviada#;
SELECT * FROM notas WHERE statusDaNota = #enviadasNormal# OR statusDaNota = #enviadasDPEC#;
SELECT * FROM notas WHERE statusDaNota = #value# AND NFe_emit_CNPJ = #cnpj#;
SELECT DISTINCT NFe_emit_CNPJ FROM notas WHERE statusDaNota = #value#
SELECT * FROM notas WHERE impressaoSolicitada > 0 AND impressoEmContingencia = false;
SELECT * FROM notas WHERE impressaoSolicitada > 0 AND impressoEmContingencia = true;
SELECT * FROM notas WHERE statusDaNota = 21 AND impressaoSolicitada = 0;
SELECT * FROM notas WHERE sincronizada = false AND statusDaNota LIKE '2%' LIMIT 0,50;
SELECT * FROM notas WHERE NFe_ide_nNF = #numeroDaNota# AND NFe_emit_CNPJ = #CNPJEmitente# AND serie = #serie#;
SELECT * FROM notas WHERE NFe_ide_nNF = #numeroDaNota# AND NFe_emit_CNPJ = #CNPJEmitente# AND serie = #serie#;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS valor FROM notas WHERE NFe_emit_CNPJ = #nota.NFe_emit_CNPJ# AND (
NFe_ide_nNF= #nota.NFe_ide_nNF#
NFe_dest_CNPJ LIKE '%' #nota.NFe_dest_CNPJ# '%'
NFe_dest_CPF LIKE '%' #nota.NFe_dest_CPF# '%'
NFe_dest_UF LIKE '%' #nota.NFe_dest_UF# '%'
NFe_dest_xNome LIKE '%' #nota.NFe_dest_xNome# '%'
emailDest LIKE '%' #nota.emailDestinatario# '%'
statusDaNota = #nota.statusDaNota#
) ;
statements.insert: INSERT INTO notas ( NFe_ide_nNF , serie, statusDaNota, pastaDeTrabalho , tentativasDeInclusao , NFe_ide_dEmi , NFe_infNFe_id , NFe_emit_CNPJ , NFe_emit_CPF , NFe_emit_xNome , NFe_dest_CNPJ , NFe_dest_CPF , NFe_dest_xNome , NFe_dest_UF , NFe_total_ICMSTot_vNF , retEnviNFe_infRec_nRec , retEnviNFe_cStat , retEnviNFe_xMotivo , protNfe_nProt, impressaoSolicitada, impressoEmContingencia, emailDest, impressora) VALUES (#NFe_ide_nNF# ,#serie# ,#statusDaNota# ,#pastaDeTrabalho# ,#tentativasDeInclusao#, #NFe_ide_dEmi# ,#NFe_infNFe_id# ,#NFe_emit_CNPJ#,#NFe_emit_CPF#, #NFe_emit_xNome#,#NFe_dest_CNPJ#,#NFe_dest_CPF#,#NFe_dest_xNome#, #NFe_dest_UF#, #NFe_total_ICMSTot_vNF#,#retEnviNFe_infRec_nRec#,#retEnviNFe_cStat#, #retEnviNFe_xMotivo#,#protNfe_nProt#,#impressaoSolicitada#,#impressoEmContingencia#, #emailDestinatario#, #impressora#);
statements.update: UPDATE notas set pastaDeTrabalho = #pastaDeTrabalho#, serie = #serie#, statusDaNota = #statusDaNota#, tentativasDeInclusao = #tentativasDeInclusao#, NFe_ide_dEmi = #NFe_ide_dEmi#, NFe_infNFe_id = #NFe_infNFe_id#, NFe_emit_CPF = #NFe_emit_CPF#, NFe_emit_xNome = #NFe_emit_xNome#, NFe_dest_CNPJ = #NFe_dest_CNPJ#, NFe_dest_CPF = #NFe_dest_CPF#, NFe_dest_xNome = #NFe_dest_xNome#, NFe_dest_UF = #NFe_dest_UF#, NFe_total_ICMSTot_vNF = #NFe_total_ICMSTot_vNF#, retEnviNFe_infRec_nRec = #retEnviNFe_infRec_nRec#, retEnviNFe_cStat = #retEnviNFe_cStat#, retEnviNFe_xMotivo = #retEnviNFe_xMotivo#, protNfe_nProt= #protNfe_nProt#, impressaoSolicitada= #impressaoSolicitada#, impressoEmContingencia= #impressoEmContingencia#, emailDest = #emailDestinatario#, impressora = #impressora#, imprimeDanfe = #imprimeDanfe#, dataUltimaAtualizacao = #dataUltimaAtualizacao#, ret_post_data = #ret_post_data# WHERE NFe_ide_nNF = #NFe_ide_nNF# AND NFe_emit_CNPJ = #NFe_emit_CNPJ# AND serie = #serie#;
UPDATE notas set sincronizada= true WHERE NFe_ide_nNF = #NFe_ide_nNF# AND NFe_emit_CNPJ = #NFe_emit_CNPJ# ;
update notas ser statusDaNota = 61 WHERE NFe_ide_nNF between #inicio# and #fim# and serie = #serie# and NFe_emit_CNPJ = #cnpj#
statements.select: select * from notas WHERE NFe_ide_nNF between #inicio# and #fim# and serie = #serie# and NFe_emit_CNPJ = #cnpj#
select * from notas WHERE statusDaNota = #value#
SELECT * FROM notas WHERE NFe_emit_CNPJ = #cnpj# AND (ret_post_data IS NULL OR NOT ret_post_data = dataUltimaAtualizacao) AND (statusDaNota = 22 OR statusDaNota = 3 OR statusDaNota = 5);
